name: The Paper Trials
description:
A first-person horror maze game. Hiding & Standing still is Death. Run or you are DEAD. Trapped in a realm of nightmarish mazes with your only hope of survival is to find all of the pages to the mysterious book and ESCAPE!

This is the first chapter in The Paper Trials. survive the first maze. You are not alone. The doctors in there and they are looking for you. Will you survive?




Arcade Horror: No hiding. Run for your life. Enemies can be avoided, but not killed.

Unique Art style: Everything is Hand drawn.

Replay ability: You will want to replay the levels multiple times until you find the best route to escape fastest time!
